verses.verse: And he <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>"Please<s%> <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> was not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>what<s%> I <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> I was <S%H5704>still<s%> in my [own] <S%H127>country<s%>? <S%H5921>Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> in order to <S%H6923>forestall<s%> this I <S%H1272>fled<s%> to <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that Thou art a <S%H2587>gracious<s%> and <S%H7349>compassionate<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness,<s%> and one who <S%H5162>relents<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H9567>calamity.<s%>

"Therefore <S%H6258>now,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4994>please<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> from me, for <S%H4194>death<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> to me <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H9132>life.<s%>"
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you have <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H3190>reason<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry<s%>?"

Then <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H5892>city<s%> and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H6924>east<s%> of it. <S%H8033>There<s%> he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H5521>shelter<s%> for himself and <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> it in the <S%H6738>shade<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H834><s%> he could <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> would <S%H1961>happen<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> a <S%H7021>plant<s%> and it <S%H5927>grew<s%> up <S%H4480>over<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> to be a <S%H6738>shade<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H7218>head<s%> to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> him from his <S%H9567>discomfort.<s%> And <S%H3124>Jonah<s%> was <S%H8057>extremely<s%> <S%H1419><s%> <S%H8055>happy<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> the <S%H7021>plant.<s%>

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> a <S%H9641>worm<s%> when <S%H7837>dawn<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> the <S%H4283>next<s%> <S%H4283>day,<s%> and it <S%H5221>attacked<s%> the <S%H7021>plant<s%> and it <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H2224>came<s%> up that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4487>appointed<s%> a <S%H2759>scorching<s%> <S%H6921>east<s%> <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and the <S%H8121>sun<s%> <S%H5221>beat<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> on Jonah's <S%H7218>head<s%> so that he <S%H5968>became<s%> <S%H5968>faint<s%> and <S%H7592>begged<s%> with [all] his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4194>"Death<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> to me <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H9132>life.<s%>"

Then <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3124>Jonah,<s%> "Do you have <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H3190>reason<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry<s%> <S%H5921>about<s%> the <S%H7021>plant<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H3190>good<s%> <S%H3190>reason<s%> to be <S%H2734>angry,<s%> even to <S%H4194>death.<s%>"

Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You <S%H2347>had<s%> <S%H2347>compassion<s%> on the <S%H7021>plant<s%> for <S%H834>which<s%> you did not <S%H5998>work,<s%> and <S%H7945>[which<s%>] you did not cause to <S%H1431>grow,<s%> which <S%H1961>came<s%> up <S%H1121>overnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> and perished <S%H6>overnight.<s%> <S%H1121><s%>

"And should I not <S%H2347>have<s%> <S%H2347>compassion<s%> on <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> are <S%H7235>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> 120000 <S%H120>persons<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> do not <S%H3045>know<s%> [the difference] <S%H996>between<s%> their <S%H3225>right<s%> and <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand,<s%> as well as <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H929>animals<s%>?"
